pr_title: Add factory methods instead of builder for TraceMultiPropagator

timeline.message: Add factory methods instead of builder for TraceMultiPropagator

timeline.bodyText: this is an odd use. Do we think maybe this is one case where we could throw an exception? An empty multi-propagator is a very strange beast.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Agreed. Now that the Builder pattern is not used, we should prevent this from happening.
replies.author: carlosalberto
anuraaga

replies.bodyText: It's definitely not harmful to have an empty multi-propagator. I was pondering if users might accidentally create one with nothing in it and be confused. There is a decent use-case for it, though, as you point out. I'm ok with it; but let's keep an eye out for confused users.
replies.author: jkwatson
